name: 🏠 Design Starter Kit • File Setup Workflow to Start Faster (Template)
description:
A starter kit workflow to build fast & efficiently 🎉


❓ Do you find it difficult to organize yourself in Figma, find yourself crumbling over an endless number of pages or you no longer know where you have placed this component?


🧠 With this workflow, there is no need to take your head to organize, create and distribute the different elements of your project. Start with a solid foundation and grow from that file.


🥽 Immerse yourself directly in a creation phase without delay!



🚴‍♀️ Start smarter, better & faster!


Hello Figmates👋

 

For 1 year now, I have been able to experiment for hours, see whole days different ways of organizing my resources and my elements on Figma. By dint of iterating, I finally found a workflow that suits me and allows me to be efficient when I start / work on projects. 💪

 

And I am happy to share it with you, the community! 🎊🎉 (Ricochet effect, I hope I could help you or draw inspiration from mine to design the workflow that suits you best).

Everyone is free to use it, it's free and I'm happy to share this with you!

 

I hope you enjoy it, stay tuned for various upcoming developments and feel free to follow me for other posts (I still have a lot to share in my wallet) 😉

 

 

🧰 How to use :

 

Duplicate and ... that's it. You are ready to design!

 

This Figma file includes the pages:

 

🔒 Cover

📖 Ressources

🔍 Userflow/Sitemap

 

📌 Last Design v0.3 (DD/MM/YYYY)

↪ Design v0.2 (DD/MM/YYYY)

↪ Design v0.1 (DD/MM/YYYY)

 

💡 Design explorations

 

🌺 Moodboard

🎨 Styleguide & Assets

❖ Components

🗑️ Trash

 


🤗 Share and follow : 

 

Share with your friends, to your colleagues everyone!

Also, I'm interested in knowing how you operate, solo or in teams.

 

Please don't hesitate to leave me a little feedback and a little like if you like the project, it's always good to know if we've been able to help someone!

 

Thank you !

 #TeamFigma #French
